      • glossiness

        public final String glossiness()
        Material glossiness in the range of [0-1], where 0 represents a rough surface and 1 represents a smooth surface. This is the inverse of a roughness map in a PBR metal workflow.

      • glossiness

        public final Specular.Builder glossiness(String value)
        Material glossiness in the range of [0-1], where 0 represents a rough surface and 1 represents a smooth surface. This is the inverse of a roughness map in a PBR metal workflow.

      • ambientOcclusionMap

        public final String ambientOcclusionMap()
        Filename of the ambient occlusion map. The map defines the amount of ambient lighting on the surface.

      • ambientOcclusionMap

        public final Specular.Builder ambientOcclusionMap(String value)
        Filename of the ambient occlusion map. The map defines the amount of ambient lighting on the surface.

      • normalMap

        public final String normalMap()
        Filename of the normal map. The normals can be in the object space or tangent space as specified in the 'type' attribute

      • normalMap

        public final Specular.Builder normalMap(String value)
        Filename of the normal map. The normals can be in the object space or tangent space as specified in the 'type' attribute
